revised_title: Molecular Dynamics Simulation of Hydrated Phospholipid Bilayers: Insights into Structure and Behavior
tldr: This study presents a molecular dynamics simulation of a hydrated bilayer of 1,2-dimyristoyl-sn-glycero-3-phosphorylcholine (DMPC) to analyze its behavior and compare it with experimental data. The simulation provides insights into the structure and dynamics of the phospholipid bilayer, which can be used as a predictive tool for studying more complex biological systems, such as membrane-bound proteins.
